revised_title: Poiseuille Gas Flow in the Transition Regime: Application of General Theory
tldr: This article investigates the gas flow in the transition regime using a relaxation-time approximation for the collision operator. The results show that the total gas flow through a capillary tube agrees with experimental values within 2%. The study applies the general theory of Poiseuille gas flow and provides a better understanding of the flow behavior in the transition region.
